abstract: Camus: A Stranger in the City, monthlong festival commemorating 70th anniversary of Albert Camus's visit to New York, offers variety of events in locations around city.

headline.print_headline: A Monthlong Celebration of Camus in New York
headline.main: A Monthlong Celebration of Albert Camus in New York

snippet: Albert Camus will be honored with a series of readings, performances, concerts and film screenings in New York.
lead_paragraph: Albert Camus will be honored with a series of readings, performances, concerts and film screenings in New York.
